name: Project Videos Extension
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' player.vimeo.com *.vimeo.com *.virtualearth.net *.cesium.com *.arcgisonline.com; object-src 'self'; img-src 'self' data: blob: *.virtualearth.net *.cesium.com *.arcgisonline.com; connect-src 'self' *.cesium.com *.virtualearth.net *.arcgisonline.com *.openweathermap.org
